name: Bookshelf
description: A bookshelf full of old, leather-bound books.

effects.name: Scouting
effects.description: A map is found tucked between the volumes.

effects.name: The hero reads a most unsettling passage.
description: ``Imagine how many ambiguous blob-like fleshy creatures you can pet at once if you had {RAND_NUM}(10_10000) tiny tentacles. Now turn to the next page if you want to learn how to achieve this!``

*the note falls off from between the pages and it reads the following*
``This is year 2133. Disney now owns global goverment and all the media. We eat, drink and work their merchandise. The last 'R' rated film was released in 2077 and its now banned all across the world along with the others. You have to stop the corporation before November 8 1973! We can afford to send only one note, so if you find it ‚Äì  don't screw this up!``

effects.name: New Positive Quirk
effects.description: The knowledge forever changes the hero.

effects.name: New Negative Quirk
effects.description: The knowledge forever changes the hero.

effects.name: Nothing happened.
effects.description: The volumes are dull and uninteresting.

name: Stack of Books
description: A stack of literary treasures in an unlikely location.

effects.name: The hero reads a most unsettling passage.
description: ``Ancestor never loved you and never will.``

effects.name: New Positive Quirk
effects.description: Reading a few pages has a lasting effect on the hero...

effects.name: New Negative Quirk
effects.description: Reading a few pages has a lasting effect on the hero...

effects.name: Nothing happened.
effects.description: The volumes are desiccated and unremarkable.

effects.name: The darkness closes around you...
effects.description: The hero reads a most unsettling passage.

effects.name: Stress
effects.description: The hero destroyed knowledge, and now must bear the guilt of it!

name: Pile of Scrolls
description: A bunch of scrolls. The cursive is sloppy and difficult to read.

effects.name: You purged a negative side of yourself.
effects.description: The scrolls are full of evil writings. Burning them is a weight off the hero's shoulders...

effects.name: The scrolls contain hideous portents.
description: ``Quad Leper is still the best comp.``
``If Bone Courtier üíÄ üç∑ and my girl üëß üòç both drowning üò± üåä and I can only save one üò§ üò¨ Catch me at my girl funeral üòî üëª üåπ with my stress up üíØ üòé``

effects.name: New Positive Quirk
effects.description: The scrolls forever change the hero.

effects.name: New Negative Quirk
effects.description: The scrolls forever change the hero.

effects.name: Nothing
effects.description: The scrolls are merely records of dull transactions...

name: Occult Scrawlings
description: Scrawlings written on what looks like stretched and tanned human flesh...

effects.name: You sprayed the scrawling with Holy Water.
effects.description: The holy water hisses and the hero feels... wrong.

effects.name: The sight is too much for the hero to bear.
New Positive Quirk
effects.description: The scrawling forever changes the hero.

effects.name: New Negative Quirk
effects.description: The scrawling forever changes the hero.

effects.name: Nothing
effects.description: The scrawlings are dull and uninteresting.
